contents.text: Welcome to AngelList, where the world meets startups.
For venture fundraising and investor matchmaking, press '1'.
For raising capital and startup funding assistance, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with a fundraising specialist.

navigationGoals: Get matched with investors for my startup’s next funding round
I need help raising seed funding for my veteran-led startup.
I need to connect with a venture capital specialist to optimize our cap table for a Series A funding round.
I need help finding investors to raise funds for my small venture.
I want to talk to a specialist about securing venture funding for my physics-based startup project.

contents.text: For learning how to invest in startups on our platform, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with an investment consultant.

navigationGoals: Learn how to set up and fund my investor account on AngelList
I want to learn how to invest my savings in early-stage startups on AngelList.
I want to discuss the mechanics of equity crowdfunding with an investment consultant on your platform.
I’d like guidance on investing some retirement savings into startups.
I’d like guidance on how to invest a small amount in early-stage startups through this platform.

contents.text: For talent acquisition and recruiting solutions, press '2'.
For employer services and posting job opportunities, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with our recruiting team.

navigationGoals: Post a job opening and streamline recruiting candidates for my team
I’d like to post job openings to recruit tech talent for my business.
Connect me with your talent acquisition team to post our developer openings and set up an ATS integration.
I need assistance posting a job opening for my small business.
I need to post a job listing to recruit a research assistant for my experimental physics team.

contents.text: For job seeker support and career opportunities, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with a career advisor.

navigationGoals: Receive personalized career advice and startup job leads
I’m looking for startup job opportunities that suit my military background.
I'd like to speak with a career advisor about matching with technical roles and fine-tuning my resume for startups.
I’m seeking career advice to find a suitable new position.
I’m seeking advice on career opportunities and internships in tech startups as a physics student.
